name: threatx
label: ThreatX
description: Use the ThreatX integration to enrich intel and automate enforcement actions on the ThreatX Next Gen WAF.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the ThreatX server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: The api key for the ThreatX server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Customer Name
fields.name: customer_name
fields.description: The customer name for the ThreatX server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Returns the Entity information by Timeframe, Entity ID, Entity Name, or Entity IP from Threat X.

parameters.title: Timeframe
parameters.name: first_seen
parameters.tooltip: Timeframe for the query. Options are 1-Hour, 1-Day, 1-Week, 1-Month, or 3-Months.
parameters.description: Specify the timeframe for the query. Options are 1-Hour, 1-Day, 1-Week, 1-Month, or 3-Months.
